channel.title: Ethylene on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Ethylene on COTTON

item.title: GbCML45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_D04G005070 Gene Symbol: GbCML45 Gene Name: calmodulin-like 45 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Positive roles of the Ca2+ sensors GbCML45 and GbCML50 in improving cotton Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhACO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACO1 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate oxidase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhXB38D represses cotton fibre elongation through ubiquitination of ethylene biosynthesis enzymes GhACS4 and GhACO1.

item.title: GhACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACS4 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 4 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhXB38D represses cotton fibre elongation through ubiquitination of ethylene biosynthesis enzymes GhACS4 and GhACO1.

item.title: GhAPX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX1 Gene Name: cytosolic ascorbate peroxidase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, a cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) cytosolic APX1 (GhAPX1) was identified to be highly accumulated during cotton fibre elongation by proteomic analysis.

item.title: GhCKX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0733 Gene Symbol: GhCKX3 Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (G.

item.title: GhCKX3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D13G2062 Gene Symbol: GhCKX3-1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A06G0643 Gene Symbol: GhCKX3-2 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D07G2372 Gene Symbol: GhCKX3-3 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhEIL3c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D13G2252 Gene Symbol: GhEIL3c Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expectedly, GhEIN3b and GhEIL3c, the two key components involved in ethylene signaling, bind directly to the GhERF9 promoter.

item.title: GhEIN3b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A05G0871 Gene Symbol: GhEIN3b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expectedly, GhEIN3b and GhEIL3c, the two key components involved in ethylene signaling, bind directly to the GhERF9 promoter.

item.title: GhERF-IIb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF-IIb3 Gene Name: cultivar Reba B50 ethylene-responsive transcription factor-IIb3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhERF-IIb3 regulates the accumulation of jasmonate and leads to enhanced cotton resistance to blight diseas.

item.title: GhERF108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G13101 Gene Symbol: GhERF108 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor ERF108 interacts with AUXIN RESPONSE FACTORs to mediate cotton fiber secondary cell wall biosynthesis.

item.title: GhERF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF6 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton Major Latex Protein 28 (GhMLP28) Functions as a Positive Regulator of the Ethylene Responsive Factor 6 (GhERF6) in Defense against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhERF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G1817 Gene Symbol: GhERF9 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 9 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we have demonstrated that one of the ERF TFs in cotton, GhERF9, exerts a regulatory role in enhancing the expression of GhHAK5a by binding to its promoter region.

item.title: GhLYI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G0312 Gene Symbol: GhLYI Gene Name: LINT YIELD INCREASING Genome: eference genome of G.

item.title: GhMLP28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMLP28 Gene Name: Major Latex Protein 28 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton Major Latex Protein 28 (GhMLP28) Functions as a Positive Regulator of the Ethylene Responsive Factor 6 (GhERF6) in Defense against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhMT3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMT3a Gene Name: Metallothionein-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton metallothionein GhMT3a, a reactive oxygen species scavenger, increased tolerance against abiotic stress in transgenic tobacco and yeast.

item.title: GhMYB108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB108 Gene Name: defense-related MYB 108 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton MYB108 forms a positive feedback regulation loop with CML11 and participates in the defense response against Verticillium dahliae infection.

item.title: GhSPL10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A12G0866 Gene Symbol: GhSPL10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The GhmiR157a–GhSPL10 regulatory module controls initial cellular dedifferentiation and callus proliferation in cotton by modulating ethylene-mediated flavonoid biosynthesis.

item.title: GhXB38D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D09G1474 Gene Symbol: GhXB38D Gene Name: Genome: reference genome sequence for G.
